title: A train of length 1000m and passes through platform of 1500 m in 30 seconds then what is the speed of the train? - Quora

response.answer_text: The distance that a train has to cover in order to pass through the platform is: length of the train + length of the platform = (1000 + 1500) m = 2500 m The time taken = 30 sec Therefore speed of the train = total distance covered/ time taken = 2500 m/ 30 s = 83.33 m/s

Length of train = 1km Length of Platform = 1.5km so distance travelled by train to pass the platform = 1 + 1.5 = 2.5km that means train travelled 2.5 kms in 30 secs, which gives the speed of it as 300km/h
